import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import { Calendar, dateFnsLocalizer } from 'react-big-calendar' import format from 'date-fns/format' import parse from 'date-fns/parse' import startOfWeek from 'date-fns/startOfWeek' import getDay from 'date-fns/getDay' import 'react-big-calendar/lib/css/react-big-calendar.css' import '../styles/Schedule.css' const locales = { "en-US": require('date-fns/locale/en-US') } const localizer = dateFnsLocalizer({ format, parse, startOfWeek, getDay, locales }) const events = [ { title: "Big Meeting", allDay: true, start: new Date(2023, 4, 0), end: new Date(2023, 4, 0) }, { title: "Vacation", start: new Date(2023, 4, 0), end: new Date(2023, 4, 0) }, { title: "Conference", start: new Date(2023, 4, 0), end: new Date(2023, 4, 0) }, ] function Schedule() { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) return (

Calendar

setModal(!modal)} > setModal(!modal)} > Kindly fill up this form.
) } export default Schedule
